name: War Stained
description:
The year is 2022, war has kicked off and taken over the world. Everywhere you look you see tales of horror and war crimes.



Take the fight into your hands and get the world back.





Features:


Multiplayer Game Modes

Conquest
Capture the flag
Rush
Team Deathmatch
Deathmatch
NEW Kill Confirmed
Controller

Third Person mode

Dynamic Crosshair
Leaning
Weapon Sway
Equippable Knife and grenade
Fire modes (BURST, AUTO & SEMI)
Weapons

Bullet Drop
Bullet Penetration
Recoil
Gameplay

Global/Team Chat
Sniper Scope
A.I. players (Bots)
Hit marker
Kill feed
Melee
Compass
Class & Perk selection
Menus

Main Menu
Host/Join session
Lobby
Graphics, Sound, Keybinds & mouse settings
